name: Windows Defender Exclusions Added
description: Detects the Setting of Windows Defender Exclusions
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:5007 AND winlog.event_data.NewValue:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Exclusions*)`
